content:
COPY for Collections

  • When performing a recursive copy, all HTTP/1.1 request headers are duplicated on the propagated method request except for the precondition headers If-Modified-Since, If-Match, If-None-Match, If-Range, If-Unmodified-Since, which are only applied to the Request-URI as preconditions on the entire operation.
